snippet: After finishing with a 29-2 record and a trip to the Final Four in the Division III N.C.A.A. tournament, the Engineers are hoping for even better this year.
abstract: Massachusetts Institute of Technology will begin its college basketball season as the highest ranked Division III team in the nation, following a 29-2 performance last season.
lead_paragraph: After finishing with a 29-2 record and a trip to the Final Four in the Division III N.C.A.A. tournament, the Engineers are hoping for even better this year.

headline.seo: M.I.T. Enters Basketball Season Ranked No. 1 in Division III
headline.main: M.I.T. Begins Season Ranked No. 1, and It’s Not a Mathematical Error
headline.print_headline: M.I.T. Begins Season Ranked No. 1, and It’s Not a Mathematical Error
